title: Meet Talha Tariq
text: Talha Tariq is the instructor of this course. He's a talented software engineer, Fiverr & Upwork freelancer, Author of many e-books, and programming instructor of thousands of students to make them capable of building web applications.

section.title: Experienced Teacher
section.content: Talha has taught 1000+ international students 1-to-1 and through bootcamps

section.title: Skilled Freelancer
section.content: Talha is known for his exceptional on Upwork and Fiverr, helping many clients with their projects.

section.title: Hackathon Winner
section.content: Talha's creativity and problem-solving have helped him win several web hackathons during university times.

section.title: Author
section.content: Talha has written several articles & books on programming and personal development.
